subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: In the longest women’s match in Open history, Johanna Konta overcame Garbiñe Muguruza, 7-6 (4), 6-7 (4), 6-2, and saunalike conditions took a toll on others.
snippet: In the longest women’s match in Open history, Johanna Konta overcame Garbiñe Muguruza, 7-6 (4), 6-7 (4), 6-2, and saunalike conditions took a toll on others.
